instruction: Suggest some ideas to make online classes more engaging.
output:
1. Connect with other students in the class.
2. Divide the day into short sessions. 
3. Ask questions and encourage interactive discussions. 
4. Make learning interesting with creative visuals. 
5. Adjust the pace of the lesson to make sure everyone keeps up. 
6. Incorporate group activities and hands-on projects. 
7. Utilize virtual tools to make classes more engaging. 
8. Assign group tasks and group quizzes. 
9. Make use of audio and video tools to provide additional context. 
10. Make sure to have frequent breaks and make time for fun activities.
